text: My name is Ruben Tigre, I am a Full Stack Developer actively looking for a job.|| After finishing my studies I decided to specialize in the development sector, for this I used different resources such as 'The Modern React Bootcamp' by Colt Steele and 'Full Stack Open' by the University of Helsinki.|| In my github you will find the project of this page, as well as different tests and deliveries that I have been doing.|| Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.
